data.name: intercontinental-kunming
data.title: InterContinental Kunming
data.content:
InterContinental Kunming

A lakeside retreat featuring exotic flora and fauna, we offer stunning views of the Dianchi area, quiet luxury and a world-class cuisine sure to make your visit to Kunming a welcome escape. We are 40 km from Kunming Airport and close to attractions such as Dianchi and Xishan. We offer 541 luxury guest rooms and suites with panoramic views of Dianchi. Our flexible 9 function spaces, including a 1,500-plus seat grand ballroom, will cater to your every meeting and banquet need.
data.address: No. 5 Yijing Road , Xishan District : Kunming , Yunnan ,650228, China (People's Republic)

nearByExperiences.name: butterfly-bar
nearByExperiences.title: BUTTERFLY BAR
nearByExperiences.description: BUTTERFLY BAR Open : 12:00 AM-11:59 PM The Butterfly Bar echoes the "Eternally Beautiful Butterfly" theme of the hotel. The inviting venue serves to allow guests to be In The Know about local culture by offering them a wider variety of perspectives, allowing them to truly experience the charm of Yunnan.

nearByExperiences.name: the-market
nearByExperiences.title: THE MARKET
nearByExperiences.description: THE MARKET Open : 12:00 AM-11:59 PM The name, "The Market" is derived from a traditional custom of the Hani Tribe, a Yunnan ethic minority group that dates back to the third century AD. Here a variety of sumptuous Mediterranean and Asian dishes are on offer, as well as a number of Yunnan delicacies, all prepared in open kitchens for guests to enjoy.

nearByExperiences.name: chambord
nearByExperiences.title: CHAMBORD
nearByExperiences.description: CHAMBORD Chambord is a noble and elegant restaurant named after one of the grandest chateaux in France. Top chefs select from the finest ingredients in the world to prepare a range of authentic French cuisine. Chambord is available for use as a multi functional banquet hall.

nearByExperiences.name: shang-tao-chinese-restaurant
nearByExperiences.title: SHANG TAO CHINESE RESTAURANT
nearByExperiences.description: SHANG TAO CHINESE RESTAURANT 11:00 AM-9:30 PM Shang Tao is the verse from the Kunming "Daguan Pavilion Poen" that depicts gourmet food. The names of the seven private rooms of this namesake restaurant cleverly borrow from phrases found in ancient poems praising butterflies. Here, you will enjoy feasts of delicious Cantonese dishes and authentic Yunnan flavors.
